DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Treatment Compliance Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that represents whether the particiapant was compliant with the protocol intervention.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Reference to the administration of interventions/treatment according to the protocol design.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A protocol is a rule which guides how an activity should be performed; a set of formal rules used to specify the format of an exchange of data.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Compliance; acting according to certain accepted standards.

Concepts.definition: Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant adherent per protocol? (80% or more of Megestrol Acetate used according to pill count)

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the participant compliant with protocol intervention per telephone conversation or email?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the participant compliant with protocol intervention?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text -3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the participant compliant with protocol intervention per telephone conversation or email?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant been compliant with protocol intervention (taken >85% of study drug) per telephone conversation or email?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant compliant (80% or more of agent used) with protocol intervention?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the participant compliant with protocol intervention per telephone conversation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the participant compliant with protocol intervention per telephone conversation, text message, or email?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant adherent per protocol? (80% or more of Metformin used according to pill count)

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant compliant per protocol? (85% or more of agent used according to study diary)

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the participant adherent with protocol intervention per telephone conversation, text message, or email?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant adherent per protocol? (80% or more of Agent used according to pill count)

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP TEXT 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant adherent per protocol (80% or more of agent used according to tablet count)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant compliant with protocol intervention (> 80% of agent used)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-TEXT-14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant compliant with protocol intervention (completed 50% or more of their treatment, at least 6 topical applications over the 6-day treatment period)?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is participant compliant per protocol (80% or more of agent used with no missed doses in the last 3 days prior to RP)?
